exercise_imp: All of the above. All of my horses enjoy getting ridden and exploring new places and get very stressed and unhappy when not ridden. One does not get ridden except the odd bareback wander because he just starts dripping with sweat from fear and anxiety under 5 minutes without doing anything bad and so I dont think it is fair to ride him however he is provided with several enrichment activities daily instead. One of the others has to be excersized or her weight is uncontrollable. It depends on the individual horses.
